Title: Extends limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Clarkstown, county of Rockland
Summary: Extends limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Clarkstown, county of Rockland for 2020--2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to extending limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Clarkstown, county of Rockland
